report.name: amortviw

dataSource.name: Q_AMORTVIW
dataSource.select:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Query Etat AMORTVIW -- (Gestion des amortissements comptables) -- Chargement sous SQL/PLUSS : @G:\Honore\Dvlp\QueryReport\Amortviw.sql; -- DESFORMAT = g:\commun\bip_dev\reports\bip088.prt -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --spool c:\honore\AMORTVIW.lst SELECT his.pid dc_pid, bip.pnom dc_pnom, bip.typproj dc_typproj, bip.astatut dc_astatut, TO_CHAR(bip.adatestatut, 'MM/YYYY') dc_adatestatut, TO_CHAR(his.aanhist, 'MM/YYYY') dc_aanhist, TO_CHAR(his.aanhist, 'YYYY') dc_annee, TO_CHAR(his.aanhist, 'MM') dc_mois, his.ajhsg dc_ajhsg, his.ajhssiif dc_ajhssiif, his.ajhssiil dc_ajhssiil, his.ajhssiip dc_ajhssiip, his.akhsgde dc_ajhsgde, his.ajhssiifde dc_ajhssiifde, his.ajhssiilde dc_ajhssiilde, his.ajhssiipde dc_ajhssiipde, his.acoutsg dc_acoutsg, his.acoussiif dc_acoutssiif, his.acoutssiil dc_acoutssiil, his.acoutssiip dc_acoutssiip, his.acoutsgde dc_acoutsgde, his.acoutssiifde dc_acoutssiifde, his.acoutssiilde dc_acoutssiilde, his.acoutssiipde dc_acoutssiipde FROM ligne_bip bip, histo_amort his WHERE his.pid = :P_PARAM6 AND his.pid = bip.pid (+) ORDER BY dc_pid, dc_pnom, dc_annee, dc_mois
--/ -- spool off
